description: un- +‎ god. Compare Dutch ontgoden, German entgöttern.

examples: They provoked Me with an ungod, they vexed Me with their empty things.

verbs.description: ungod (third-person singular simple present ungods, present participle ungodding, simple past and past participle ungodded)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To divest of a god; to atheize.
(transitive) To divest of godly powers; to strip of divinity.
examples: Perhaps Saladin's "ungodding" of his father is a necessary first step for the male child's emancipation...
